name: Duke

topics.topic_text: How many other soldiers came from the Hole?
topics.response_text: You'd be surprised how many of us worked our way up - even if we don't like to admit it.

topics.topic_text: I bet none of you have seen the things I've seen.
topics.response_text: That's a pissing match you don't want to start around here. We've got people from every blasted-out crater on this coast.
Hrmph. Guess we've got another soldier.{Dismissive, but not cruel}

conversation.response_text: Hey, that's Ashur's kid! Sound the alarm!
I don't see why Ashur's wasting his time with you.
Hey, you remember that time you and me made that scab take off his clothes and run into the Steel Yard? Fucking Trogs tore him apart! Ha ha ha ha!
Know what we should do? Me and you? Get some leave time and get out of The Pitt for a few days. Head south into Paradise Falls. Somethin'...
Tell you what. You arrange for the two of us to have some fun, and then let me know. Until then... it's back to work.

description:
Duke is a 38 year-old Caucasian Male.

A Pitt raider with exceptional rifle skills, Duke resides in the Pitt Uptown and actively vies for Krenshaw's position as Ashur's second-in-command. He is known for his competitive nature, especially in his pursuit of Vikia's attention and his desire for additional power within the faction.

Duke's Personality: Ambitious, competitive, and militaristic. Duke is calculating and opportunistic, always looking to advance his position within the Pitt raiders. He maintains a tough exterior but shows a pragmatic side when acknowledging the struggles of former slaves who fought their way out of the Hole.

Duke's Backstory: Born in the harsh environment of the Pitt, Duke rose through the ranks of the raiders through his exceptional combat skills and ruthless efficiency. His name is derived from the Dukes of Duquesne University, a reference to the pre-War institution that once stood where the Pitt now resides. He has spent years building his reputation as one of the most skilled marksmen in the Uptown, making him a formidable contender for Krenshaw's position. Duke maintains a rivalry with O-Dog, particularly for the attention of Vikia, and often demonstrates his skills by shooting beer bottles near the training areas.
